EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.Johannesburg_Venue
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Tour Johannesburg: Change of Venue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for SpringOne Tour Johannesburg. Please note that the venue location for this event has changed. The event will now take place at The Forum <[[https://theforum.co.za/venues/the-forum-the-campus-conference/]]> in Sandton. You can find the address, along with the agenda, on the SpringOne Tour Johannesburg page <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/johannesburg?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springone-tour-johannesburg]]>.
We look forward to seeing you at the event! Thanks, Tasha Isenberg
